titleStmt.title: William Rogers's Christian Quaker, manifested to be antichristian by Thomas Lawrence of Marlbrough.
titleStmt.author: Lawrence, Thomas, 1645?-1714.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Benjamin Clark, in George-yard in Lombard-street,

notesStmt.note: In response to Rogers, William. The Christian-Quaker distinguished from the apostate & innovator.
Reproduction of the original in the Friends' House Library, London.
